pawathi siyaluma rajayan wala janadhipathiwarun sama sakachchua aarambha kale dhanathmaka aakalpayakin.owun el.ti.ti.ee ye saba wuwamanakam dana sitiye naha.el.ti.ti.ee yath sama sakachchua walata ekagawunu sama awasthawakadima, pawathi rajayan owun wetha wisadum idiripath karanna sudanamin sitiya.namuth lada deyin sahimakata path wena sirithak nothibunu nisama, el.ti.ti.ee yata ema wisadum walata eha giya yamak ee hama awasthawakadima wuwamana wuna.balaya bedima gana rajaya ekka sakachchua pawathwamin sitina kota owun anek pasin kale satan wirama giwisuma bida damamin hamudawata pa්rahara ella karana eka, hamuda bhatayinwa lajjawata path karapu eka.
